name: Dead Poet's Society Trivia Game | Dead Poets Society . | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the name of Neil's roommate?
Mr. Keating told the boys to do what with the introductions of their books?
'O Captain, My Captain,' is a poem by Walt Whitman about whom?
questions.explanation:
Abraham Lincoln.

	Mr. Keating told this to the boys early in the school year.

questions.text: Dead Poet's Society meetings were held where?
options: in one of the dorm rooms

questions.text: What did Neil really want to do in life?
questions.explanation:
act.

	he acted as Puck in 'Midsummer Night's Dream.'

questions.text: Who of the following was not a name of one of the boys?
Which character finally sounded his 'barbaric yawp'?

questions.explanation:
Ethan Hawke.

	he was so good!
